name: DO-K8S-Auth
description: Task to automatically get the latest kubernetes config file for a Digital Ocean Kubernetes cluster
author: Moodio

inputs.name: pat
inputs.label: Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Personal access token for the DigitalOcean api

inputs.name: clusterName
inputs.label: Cluster name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the DigitalOcean kubernetes cluster. This can be found on your DigitalOcean dashboard

inputs.name: configOutput
inputs.label: Output config to
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where to output retrieved config.yaml. To output to a file, select file, otherwise select variable and enter a variable name

inputs.name: outputFilePath
inputs.label: Output file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to output the kubeconfig config.yaml file to

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable name to output config to
